snippet: James Harden scored 29 points as Oklahoma City knocked defending N.B.A. champion Dallas out of the playoffs.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder defeat Dallas Mavericks, 103-97, to win first-round NBA playoff series and sweep the defending champions, 4-0.
lead_paragraph: James Harden scored 29 points as Oklahoma City knocked defending N.B.A. champion Dallas out of the playoffs.

headline.seo: Thunder Sweep Mavericks With Win at Dallas
headline.main: Mavericks Are Swept Off Their Throne by Thunder
headline.print_headline: The Mavericks Are Swept Off Their Throne by the Thunder
